verses.verse: And it came to pass in the twelfth<WH8147> year<WH8141>, in the twelfth month<WH2320>, in the first<WH259> day of the month<WH2320>, that the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, take up<WH5375> a lamentation<WH7015> over Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>, and say<WH559> unto him<WH1819>, Thou wast likened unto a young lion<WH3715> of the nations<WH1471>: yet art thou as a monster<WH8577> in the seas<WH3220>; and thou didst break forth<WH1518> with thy rivers<WH5104>, and troubledst<WH1804> the waters<WH4325> with thy feet<WH7272>, and fouledst<WH7515> their rivers<WH5104>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: I will spread out<WH6566> my net<WH7568> upon thee with a company<WH6951> of many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971>; and they shall bring thee up<WH5927> in my net<WH2764>.

And I will leave<WH5203> thee upon the land<WH776>, I will cast thee forth<WH2904> upon the open<WH6440> field<WH7704>, and will cause all the birds<WH5775> of the heavens<WH8064> to settle<WH7931> upon thee<WH7646>, and I will satisfy the beasts<WH2416> of the whole earth with thee<WH776>.
And I will lay<WH5414> thy flesh<WH1320> upon the mountains<WH2022>, and fill<WH4390> the valleys<WH1516> with thy height<WH7419>.
I will also water<WH8248> with thy blood<WH1818> the land<WH776> wherein thou swimmest<WH6824>, even to the mountains<WH2022>; and the watercourses<WH650> shall be full of thee<WH4390>.

And when I shall extinguish<WH3518> thee<WH3680>, I will cover the heavens<WH8064>, and make<WH6937> the stars<WH3556> thereof dark<WH6937>; I will cover<WH3680> the sun<WH8121> with a cloud<WH6051>, and the moon<WH3394> shall not give<WH215> its light<WH216>.
All the bright<WH3974> lights<WH216> of heaven<WH8064> will I make dark<WH6937> over thee<WH5414>, and set darkness<WH2822> upon thy land<WH776>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

I will also vex<WH3707> the hearts<WH3820> of many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971>, when I shall bring<WH935> thy destruction<WH7667> among the nations<WH1471>, into the countries<WH776> which thou hast not known<WH3045>.

Yea <WH7227>, I will make many peoples<WH5971> amazed<WH8074> at thee<WH4428>, and their kings shall be horribly<WH8178> afraid<WH8175> for thee<WH5774>, when I shall brandish my sword<WH2719> before them<WH6440>; and they shall tremble<WH2729> at every moment<WH7281>, every man<WH376> for his own life<WH5315>, in the day<WH3117> of thy fall<WH4658>.
For thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: The sword<WH2719> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> shall come upon thee<WH935>.

By the swords<WH2719> of the mighty<WH1368> will I cause thy multitude<WH1995> to fall<WH5307>; the terrible<WH6184> of the nations<WH1471> are they all<WH7703>: and they shall bring to nought the pride<WH1347> of Egypt<WH4714>, and all the multitude<WH1995> thereof shall be destroyed<WH8045>.

I will destroy<WH6> also all the beasts<WH929> thereof from<WH5921> beside many<WH7227> waters<WH4325>; neither shall the foot<WH7272> of man<WH120> trouble<WH1804> them any more<WH6541>, nor the hoofs of beasts<WH929> trouble them<WH1804>.
Then will I make their waters<WH4325> clear<WH8257>, and cause their rivers<WH5104> to run<WH3212> like oil<WH8081>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

When I shall make<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> desolate<WH8077> and waste<WH776>, a land destitute<WH8074> of that whereof it was full<WH4393>, when I shall smite<WH5221> all them that dwell<WH3427> therein<WH3045>, then shall they know that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.

This is the lamentation<WH7015> wherewith they shall lament<WH6969>; the daughters<WH1323> of the nations<WH1471> shall lament<WH6969> therewith<WH4714>; over Egypt, and over all her multitude<WH1995>, shall they lament<WH6969> therewith<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
It came to pass also in the twelfth<WH8147> year<WH8141>, in the fifteenth<WH2568> day of the month<WH2320>, that the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, wail<WH5091> for the multitude<WH1995> of Egypt<WH4714>, and cast them down<WH3381>, even her<WH1323>, and the daughters of the famous<WH117> nations<WH1471>, unto the nether parts<WH8482> of the earth<WH776>, with them that go down<WH3381> into the pit<WH953>.
Whom dost thou pass in beauty<WH5276>? go down<WH3381>, and be thou laid<WH7901> with the uncircumcised<WH6189>.
They shall fall<WH5307> in the midst<WH8432> of them that are slain<WH2491> by the sword<WH2719>: she is delivered<WH5414> to the sword<WH2719>; draw<WH4900> her away and all her multitudes<WH1995>.

The strong<WH410> among the mighty<WH1368> shall speak<WH1696> to him out of the midst<WH8432> of Sheol<WH7585> with them that help<WH5826> him<WH3381>: they are gone down, they lie<WH7901> still<WH6189>, even the uncircumcised, slain<WH2491> by the sword<WH2719>.
Asshur <WH804> is there and all her company<WH6951>; her graves<WH6913> are round about<WH5439> her<WH2491>; all of them slain, fallen<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>;

whose graves<WH6913> are set<WH5414> in the uttermost<WH3411> parts of the pit<WH953>, and her company<WH6951> is round about<WH5439> her grave<WH6900>; all of them slain<WH2491>, fallen<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>, who caused<WH5414> terror<WH2851> in the land<WH776> of the living<WH2416>.

There is Elam<WH5867> and all her multitude<WH1995> round about<WH5439> her grave<WH6900>; all of them slain<WH2491>, fallen<WH5307> by the sword<WH2719>, who are gone down<WH3381> uncircumcised<WH6189> into the nether parts<WH8482> of the earth<WH776>, who caused<WH5414> their terror<WH2851> in the land<WH776> of the living<WH2416>, and have borne<WH5375> their shame<WH3639> with them that go down<WH3381> to the pit<WH953>.

They have set<WH5414> her a bed<WH4904> in the midst<WH8432> of the slain<WH2491> with all her multitude<WH1995>; her graves<WH6913> are round about<WH5439> her<WH6189>; all of them uncircumcised, slain<WH2491> by the sword<WH2719>; for their terror<WH2851> was caused<WH5414> in the land<WH776> of the living<WH2416>, and they have borne<WH5375> their shame<WH3639> with them that go down<WH3381> to the pit<WH953>: he is put<WH5414> in the midst<WH8432> of them that are slain<WH2491>.

There is Meshech<WH4902>, Tubal<WH8422>, and all their multitude<WH1995>; their graves<WH6913> are round about<WH5439> them<WH6189>; all of them uncircumcised, slain<WH2490> by the sword<WH2719>; for they caused<WH5414> their terror<WH2851> in the land<WH776> of the living<WH2416>.

And they shall not lie<WH7901> with the mighty<WH1368> that are fallen<WH5307> of the uncircumcised<WH6189>, that are gone down<WH3381> to Sheol<WH7585> with their weapons<WH3627> of war<WH4421>, and have laid<WH5414> their swords<WH2719> under their heads<WH7218>, and their iniquities<WH5771> are upon their bones<WH6106>; for they were the terror<WH2851> of the mighty<WH1368> in the land<WH776> of the living<WH2416>.
But thou shalt be broken<WH7665> in the midst<WH8432> of the uncircumcised<WH6189>, and shalt lie<WH7901> with them that are slain<WH2491> by the sword<WH2719>.

There is Edom<WH123>, her kings<WH4428> and all her princes<WH5387>, who in their might<WH1369> are laid<WH5414> with them that are slain<WH2491> by the sword<WH2719>: they shall lie<WH7901> with the uncircumcised<WH6189>, and with them that go down<WH3381> to the pit<WH953>.

There are the princes<WH5257> of the north<WH6828>, all of them<WH6722>, and all the Sidonians, who are gone down<WH3381> with the slain<WH2491>; in the terror<WH2851> which they caused by their might<WH1369> they are put to shame<WH954>; and they lie<WH7901> uncircumcised<WH6189> with them that are slain<WH2491> by the sword<WH2719>, and bear<WH5375> their shame<WH3639> with them that go down<WH3381> to the pit<WH953>.

Pharaoh <WH6547> shall see<WH7200> them<WH5162>, and shall be comforted over all his multitude<WH1995>, even Pharaoh<WH6547> and all his army<WH2428>, slain<WH2491> by the sword<WH2719>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

For I have put<WH5414> his terror<WH2851> in the land<WH776> of the living<WH2416>; and he shall be laid<WH7901> in the midst<WH8432> of the uncircumcised<WH6189>, with them that are slain<WH2491> by the sword<WH2719>, even Pharaoh<WH6547> and all his multitude<WH1995>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
